snippet: Jem Cohen has been taking Polaroids of New York City for 30 years. The images, he said, emphasize "the connection between a non-touristic city and our respect for time."
abstract: Jem Cohen has been taking Polaroids of New York City for 30 years. The images, he said, emphasize "the connection between a non-touristic city and our respect for time."

headline.main: The Lonesome Ghosts of a City's Past
headline.print_headline: The Lonesome Ghosts Of a City’s Past
